Info

This is just a test document for Benchmark.js.

Preparation code

<div>Lorem ipsum</div>
<script>
  var arr = [1, 5, 4, 2, 3];

  function init() {
    window.console && console.log('init called');
  }
</script>
<script>
Benchmark.prototype.setup = function() {
  window.foo = 42;
  var x = arr;
};

Benchmark.prototype.teardown = function() {
  window.foo = 24;
};
</script>
